name: Captain Wayne - Vacation Desperation Demo
description:
most ruthless mercenaries in all the seven-and-a-half seas, the Killer Whales, while laying waste to Orca Isle in your conquest to rob the rich to feed the badass!

With a load of weapons at his disposal, the captain can mow down enemies with his double-barreled palm, rip enemies apart with his devious chain-gun fingers, toss a bottle of the explosive Boom Brew at them, unleash the force of thunder from his palms, or PUNCH THEM ‘TIL THEY’RE PASTE! Power through 8 action-packed levels in the full game filled to the brim with the gripping cinematics of Wayne’s daring triumphs and threats. What are you waiting for? Those Killer Whale bastards aren’t gonna shoot themselves!

This demo contains one level, as well as a tutorial to help learn how to play.

If you're a fan of the demo, please wishlist us on Steam to be notified when the full game releases

JOIN OUR DISCORD and tell us how we did!
